title: Sous Vide Chicken Breast
directions: Pre-heat your Sous Video to 146Â° F. Allow the water bath to come to temperature before adding your chicken.
Season chicken breasts generously with salt and pepper.
Seal the chicken in the bag, removing all air
Drop the bag in the water bath, making sure not to block the intake or output sections of your Precision Cooker. If properly sealed, chicken should sink.
ingredients: 1 tbsp / 15 ml Vegetable, canola, or rice bran oil
